seg.quote: The bed swayed with the motion of the ship.
Just keep moving, stay in motion.

sense.def:
A motion
je dejanje, gib ali premik.

seg.quote: He made stabbing motions with his spear.
With a quick motion of her hands, she did her hair up in a knot.

sense.def:
Na sestanku ali v razpravi je
a motion
predlog, o katerem udeleženci razpravljajo in glasujejo.

seg.quote: He proposed the motion that ‘the Public Schools of England should be abolished’.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
motions to someone
, naredi gib z roko, da bi mu pokazal, kaj naj naredi.

seg.quote: Boylan motioned to Rudolph to sit down.
He motioned Tom to follow him.
He shook hands and motioned him to a seat.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
goes through the motions
, pove ali naredi, kar se pričakuje od njega, ne da bi bil preveč iskren ali resen pri tem.

seg.quote: Major Hawks went through the motions of advising me to quit.

sense.def:
Dogajanje ali dogodek, ki je
in motion
, se že dogaja.

seg.quote: The changes are already in motion.
